name: NSWhoseSpecifier.SubelementIdentifier
desc: NSWhoseSpecifier uses these constants to specify sub-elements within the collection of objects being tested that pass the specifierâ€™s test.

items.name: case indexSubelement
items.desc: An element at a given index that meets the specifier test.

items.name: case everySubelement
items.desc: Every element that meets the specifier test.

items.name: case middleSubelement
items.desc: The middle element that meets the specifier test.

items.name: case randomSubelement
items.desc: Any element that meets the specifier test.

items.name: case noSubelement
items.desc: No sub-element met the specifier test. Valid only for specifying the end sub-element.; that is, there is no end, so consider all elements.
